texts.label: text
texts.orig: With the exponential growth of unstructured digital documents-ranging from legal contracts and research papers to handwritten notes and resumes-there is a pressing need for intelligent systems that can understand, summarize, and visually interpret document content. This project presents a comprehensive Document Intelligence System that leverages transformerbased vision-language models and Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) to perform endto-end analysis of heterogeneous documents.
texts.text: With the exponential growth of unstructured digital documents-ranging from legal contracts and research papers to handwritten notes and resumes-there is a pressing need for intelligent systems that can understand, summarize, and visually interpret document content. This project presents a comprehensive Document Intelligence System that leverages transformerbased vision-language models and Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) to perform endto-end analysis of heterogeneous documents.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: The system supports auto-summarization, semantic Q&A, document classification, and context-aware visual explanation, even on complex formats like PDFs and handwritten documents. A key innovation is the generation of flowcharts and structured visual representations derived from document logic-especially useful in legal or technical domains.
texts.text: The system supports auto-summarization, semantic Q&A, document classification, and context-aware visual explanation, even on complex formats like PDFs and handwritten documents. A key innovation is the generation of flowcharts and structured visual representations derived from document logic-especially useful in legal or technical domains.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: By combining OCR pipelines (for handwritten and scanned data) with multimodal transformers, the system extracts, understands, and converts raw documents into natural language answers, structured metadata, and interactive visual overlays.
texts.text: By combining OCR pipelines (for handwritten and scanned data) with multimodal transformers, the system extracts, understands, and converts raw documents into natural language answers, structured metadata, and interactive visual overlays.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Designed for non-expert users, the system simplifies complex documents into intuitive formats, with applications in legal, academic, and enterprise domains.
texts.text: Designed for non-expert users, the system simplifies complex documents into intuitive formats, with applications in legal, academic, and enterprise domains.
